QuestData.Title: Waking the Shieldmaiden
QuestData.Description:
With the rituals disrupted and her bones returned, we may be able to wrest Ashildir from the grasp of these Bonespeakers.
Deeper within Haustvald, the mystics possess a special altar that can reunite the body and spirit of a fallen warrior. With this, we may be able to return Ashildir's spirit into her bones, and out of the grasp of these foul mystics.
Go outsider, I will rally her guard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Rune of Reformation to return Ashildir's spirit to her bones.
QuestData.RewardText: Where... where am I now? $B$BI... know you...
